sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { AppBar, Box, Button, Tab, Tabs, Toolbar, Typography } from "@mui/material"
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux';
import { authActions, adminActions } from '../store'; // import adminActions

const Header = () => {

  const dispatch = useDispatch()

  const isLoggedIn = useSelector(state => state.auth.isLoggedIn); // access the isLoggedIn state from the auth slice
  const isAdminLoggedIn = useSelector(state => state.admin.isLoggedIn); // add selector for isAdminLoggedIn

  const [value, setValue] = useState();

  return (
    <AppBar position='sticky'>

      <Toolbar>
        <Typography variant='h4'>
          Podcasts
        </Typography>
        {isLoggedIn && <Box display="flex" marginLeft={"auto"} marginRight="auto">
          <Tabs textColor='inherit' value={value} onChange={(e, val) => setValue(val)}>
            <Tab LinkComponent={Link} to="/1" label="1" />
            <Tab LinkComponent={Link} to="/2" label="2" />
            <Tab LinkComponent={Link} to="/3" label="3" />
          </Tabs>
        </Box>}

        {/* display admin login/signup button if admin is not logged in */}
        {!isAdminLoggedIn && 
          <Button
            LinkComponent={Link} to="/admin"
            variant="contained"
            color="warning"
          >
            Admin Login/Signup
          </Button>
        }

        {/* display user login/signup button if user is not logged in */}
        {!isLoggedIn && 
          <Button
            LinkComponent={Link} to="/auth"
            variant="contained"
            color="warning"
          >
            Signup/Login
          </Button>
        }

        {/* display logout button for user if user is logged in */}
        {isLoggedIn && 
          <Button
            onClick={() => dispatch(authActions.logout())}
            LinkComponent={Link} to="/auth"
            variant="contained"
            color="warning"
          >
            LogOut
          </Button>
        }

        {/* display logout button for admin if admin is logged in */}
        {isAdminLoggedIn &&
          <Button
            onClick={() => dispatch(adminActions.logout())}
            LinkComponent={Link} to="/admin"
            variant="contained"
            color="warning"
          >
            LogOut
          </Button>
        }
      </Toolbar>
    </AppBar>
  )
}

export default Header
